description: This file declares exported API functions related to a Byte Array component for a broad system, including creation, removal, and initialization functions.

methods.name: AnscCreateByteArrayComponent
methods.description: Creates a new byte array component with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayCOCreate
methods.description: Constructs an instance of the byte array component.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayCORemove
methods.description: Removes or deletes the byte array component instance.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayCOEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects or dependencies into the byte array component.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayCOInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the byte array component, setting up internal state.
